response.raw:
Here is a client-ready memo for the task:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO: Customer Service Representative Responsibilities

As a senior Customer Service Representative, your primary duties include:

• Communicating with customers via phone and in-person to address inquiries
• Providing accurate information about our products and services
• Processing customer orders and entering them into our system
• Assisting with account cancellations as needed
• Documenting details of customer complaints for resolution
• Maintaining a professional, courteous demeanor in all customer interactions
• Identifying opportunities for upselling or cross-selling when appropriate
• Resolving issues promptly or escalating to management when necessary

Remember that you are often the first point of contact for our customers. Your role is critical in ensuring customer satisfaction and representing our company in a positive manner. Please reach out to your supervisor with any questions.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
